tr.td: Specifies the range to use when generating the developer and file activity logs. This is used by the "activity" goal. The default value is 30 days.

Specifies a fully qualified class name implementing the org.apache.maven.changelog.ChangeLogFactory interface. The class creates the ChangeLogGenerator and ChangeLogParser pair required to create the change log. This is used by the "changelog" and "activity" goals. The default value is org.apache.maven.cvslib.CvsChangeLogFactory.
